column1: * 1949 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Miss How.
* 2002 - The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)) is released on DVD.

column2: Myth and the Measure of Truth is published.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
